name: PAN!
description:
This game started out as a short 1 hour gamejam game, then it grew into something somewhat bigger after about 7 more hours of work were put into it.

This is still a rather small game so it's free, but if you pay 4 dollars or more you'll get a pack of all the models in the game with it!

Do note that all of these models don't have textures or UV maps as they are entirely colored using vertex coloring, the pack includes a unity package with 2 basic vertex color shaders in it though, but if you're not using Unity you'll have to find out a way to let the vertex colors color the models or otherwise unwrap them somehow!

I hope you'll enjoy messing with this small game thing as much as I had fun making it! :D

Update 2/29/2016: Added HTC Vive version. :D
